# ADO.NET

> Documentation for ADO.NET.

*Topics available: 606*

## Subtopics

- [ADO.NET Extended Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/llms-extended.txt): 155 additional topics
- [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/llms.txt): Topics available: 72; DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews documentation and reference.
- [ADO.NET Entity Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/llms.txt): Topics available: 174; ADO.NET Entity Framework documentation and reference.
- [SQL Server and ADO.NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/llms.txt): Topics available: 205; SQL Server and ADO.NET documentation and reference.
